subject: Baseball
Stained Glass
lead_paragraph: After four consecutive failures in division series from 2000-3, the Oakland A's finally had a chance to celebrate when they beat the Twins 8-3 to complete a three-game sweep.
snippet: After four consecutive failures in division series from 2000-3, the Oakland A's finally had a chance to celebrate when they beat the Twins 8-3 to complete a three-game sweep.
